author: jerenkrantz
msg: Don't prefix $(SHELL) on the apr-libtool argument, as we're not guaranteed
that libtool is a shell script.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Re-enable IPv6 on Darwin 6.6 and beyond as it looks like getaddrinfo() now
(It works here, but independent confirmation would be welcomed.)

author: thommay
msg: Add apr_temp_dir_get(), a function to get the most suitable directory to place
temp files based on environment variables and other factors.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Set the hostnames on all apr_sockaddr_t's returned.
Since we're at the same lifetime as the prev_sa, it's safe to just point
